events.event_name: Nomination of Kevin Warsh as Fed chair
events.description: President Trump nominated Kevin Warsh to succeed as the next Federal Reserve chair.
The release of private payroll growth data for the US labor market.
The release of the services sector Purchasing Managers' Index data.
US forces downed an Iranian drone near an aircraft carrier in the Arabian Sea.
Scheduled diplomatic talks between the US and Iran.

facts.fact_text: Gold traded just under the $5,000 mark on Wednesday.

evidences.evidence_text: Gold pared earlier gains on Wednesday to trade just under the $5,000 mark

facts.fact_text: ADP report showed private payroll growth was lower than expected.

evidences.evidence_text: ADP report, which showed private payroll growth undershooting expectations

facts.fact_text: ISM services PMI was stronger than forecast.

evidences.evidence_text: stronger-than-forecast ISM services PMI pointed to resilient activity in the sector

facts.fact_text: Gold prices rose by more than 6% in the previous trading session.

evidences.evidence_text: Bullion had surged more than 6% in the prior session, its biggest daily jump since 2008

facts.fact_text: US forces downed an Iranian drone in the Arabian Sea.

evidences.evidence_text: US forces downed an Iranian drone near an aircraft carrier in the Arabian Sea

claims.claim_text: Investors are evaluating US economic data to determine the Federal Reserve's future policy path.

evidences.evidence_text: investors assessed fresh US economic data and its implications for the Federal Reserve’s policy path

claims.claim_text: The surge in gold was driven by dip buyers following a previous price drop.

evidences.evidence_text: after dip buyers stepped in following a sharp pullback earlier in the week

claims.claim_text: Geopolitical tensions are maintaining demand for gold as a safe-haven asset.

evidences.evidence_text: Safe-haven demand also remained supported by geopolitical tensions

evidence.evidence_text: investors assessed fresh US economic data and its implications for the Federal Reserve’s policy path
Safe-haven demand also remained supported by geopolitical tensions
attention turned to the ADP report, which showed private payroll growth undershooting expectations
ISM services PMI pointed to resilient activity in the sector
